pca_apply_large

PURPOSE

Wrapper for pca_apply that allows for application to large X.

SYNOPSIS

function [ Yk, Xhat, avsq ] = pca_apply_large( X, U, mu, vars, k )

DESCRIPTION 

 Wrapper for pca_apply that allows for application to large X.

 Wrapper for pca_apply that splits and processes X in parts, this may be
 useful if processing cannot be done fully in parallel because of memory
 constraints. See pca_apply for usage.

 USAGE
  same as pca_apply

 INPUTS
  same as pca_apply

 OUTPUTS
  same as pca_apply

 EXAMPLE

 See also PCA, PCA_APPLY, PCA_VISUALIZE

CROSS-REFERENCE INFORMATION

This function calls:
  • pca_apply Companion function to pca.
This function is called by:

SOURCE CODE 

0001 % Wrapper for pca_apply that allows for application to large X.
0002 %
0003 % Wrapper for pca_apply that splits and processes X in parts, this may be
0004 % useful if processing cannot be done fully in parallel because of memory
0005 % constraints. See pca_apply for usage.
0006 %
0007 % USAGE
0008 %  same as pca_apply
0009 %
0010 % INPUTS
0011 %  same as pca_apply
0012 %
0013 % OUTPUTS
0014 %  same as pca_apply
0015 %
0016 % EXAMPLE
0017 %
0018 % See also PCA, PCA_APPLY, PCA_VISUALIZE
0019 
0020 % Piotr's Image&Video Toolbox      Version 1.5
0021 % Written and maintained by Piotr Dollar    pdollar-at-cs.ucsd.edu
0022 % Please email me if you find bugs, or have suggestions or questions!
0023 
0024 function [ Yk, Xhat, avsq ] = pca_apply_large( X, U, mu, vars, k )
0025 
0026 siz = size(X); nd = ndims(X);  [N,r]  = size(U);
0027 if(N==prod(siz) && ~(nd==2 && siz(2)==1)); siz=[siz, 1]; nd=nd+1; end
0028 inds = {':'}; inds = inds(:,ones(1,nd-1));
0029 d= prod(siz(1:end-1));
0030 
0031 % some error checking
0032 if(d~=N); error('incorrect size for X or U'); end
0033 if(isa(X,'uint8')); X = double(X); end
0034 if( k>r )
0035   warning(['Only ' int2str(r) '<k comp. available.']); %#ok<WNTAG>
0036   k=r;
0037 end
0038 
0039 % Will run out of memory if X has too many elements.  Hence, run
0040 % pca_apply on parts of X and recombine.
0041 maxwidth = ceil( (10^7) / d );
0042 if(maxwidth > siz(end))
0043   if (nargout==1)
0044     Yk = pca_apply( X, U, mu, vars, k );
0045   elseif (nargout==2)
0046     [Yk, Xhat] = pca_apply( X, U, mu, vars, k );
0047   else
0048     [ Yk, Xhat, avsq ] = pca_apply( X, U, mu, vars, k );
0049   end
0050 else
0051   Yk = zeros( k, siz(end) );  Xhat = zeros( siz );
0052   avsq = 0;  avsqOrig = 0;  last = 0;
0053   while(last < siz(end))
0054     first=last+1;  last=min(first+maxwidth-1,siz(end));
0055     Xi = X(inds{:}, first:last);
0056     if( nargout==1 )
0057       Yki = pca_apply( Xi, U, mu, vars, k );
0058     else
0059       if( nargout==2 )
0060         [Yki,Xhati] = pca_apply( Xi, U, mu, vars, k );
0061       else
0062         [Yki,Xhati,avsqi,avsqOrigi] = pca_apply( Xi, U, mu, vars, k );
0063         avsq = avsq + avsqi;  avsqOrig = avsqOrig + avsqOrigi;
0064       end;
0065       Xhat(inds{:}, first:last ) = Xhati;
0066     end
0067     Yk( :, first:last ) = Yki;
0068   end;
0069   if( nargout==3); avsq = avsq / avsqOrig; end
0070 end
